name: Atonement (Kamolchanok)
description:
An action 2D side-scrolling game, with a story that's based on the ancient history of archangels of the bible but reinterpreted.

The story is about after God expelled Lucifer from heaven, the archangel rebelled against him and took him down, abandoned the heaven then took control of the earth. Making the world corrupted, they manipulate humanity in the shadows.

In  2097, Adam, who was once expelled from heaven. He raised his sword and fought against the angels, to hope for peace in this world.

In this game, you'll play as Adam then fight with the 4 archangel bosses, Gabriel, Uriel, Raphael and Michael, each boss will be protecting a warp gate that'll bring you to the next map. You need to take them down before you enter the gate.

Another of your mission is to save Eve that was kidnapped and save Lucifer from hell.

 Game concept art and boss map

How to play

arrow keys : move forward/ backward and jump

Z : slash

X : shoot

Another key and skill will be unlocked when you achieved each map.

This game is a midterm project of IG303 subject,  College of Creative Design and Entertainment Technology, Dhurakij Pundit University.2 weeks of project duration and us, a team of three :
